entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
